body_html:
The problem with Monitors was that they were too specific to the Estimator class. We wanted a similar solution for training loops not written as an Estimator, so we pulled Monitors further down to attach them more directly to the run calls in a session.

They should be able to do everything the Monitors did (in fact, they should be able to do more). What functionality is missing?
body_text:
The problem with Monitors was that they were too specific to the Estimator class. We wanted a similar solution for training loops not written as an Estimator, so we pulled Monitors further down to attach them more directly to the run calls in a session.
They should be able to do everything the Monitors did (in fact, they should be able to do more). What functionality is missing?
body:
The problem with `Monitors` was that they were too specific to the `Estimator` class. We wanted a similar solution for training loops not written as an `Estimator`, so we pulled `Monitor`s further down to attach them more directly to the run calls in a session.

They should be able to do everything the Monitors did (in fact, they should be able to do more). What functionality is missing?
